RevisionEvent.Note: Added DOI and PublicationInfo minted by JMW on 20230801. Updated SPASE version.

ResourceHeader.Description: This describes the data produce for ICON EUV Daytime O+ (DP 2.6), which is in NetCDF4 format. These files are named ICON_L2-6_EUV_YYYY-MM-DD_vXXrZZ.NC, where YYYY-MM-DD is the year month day and VXX shows the version number and rZZ shows the revision number of this file. Each individual file nominally contains 1 day (24 hours) of data. The L2 EUV Daytime files are produced from the L1 EUV files, and their primary data product is the O+ profile derived from a retrieval that is detailed in a paper: https://doi.org/10.1007/s11214-017-0385-1. In addition, many other parameters and geophysical data products are included in the file. The data are identified in one of 3 var_types: data – which contains the primary data product; support data – which contains parameters used in the retrieval such as geometry etc. that may also be useful in any analysis of this data; and ignore_data – which are recorded for debugging purposes and should not be used for publication without detailed discussion with the ICON team. The dimensions of the data also indicate its type. For example, anything with epoch as a dimension means there is 1 value corresponding to each instrument exposure. Anything with dimension Input_data corresponds to the input data, passed from Level 1. Anything with a dimension of model refers to the forward model parameters used as part of the inversion. Anything with dimension altitude corresponds to the altitude grid used for the inverted parameters.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: National Aeronautics and Space Administration; Dr. Andrew W. Stephan; Dr. Thomas Immel

InformationURL.Name: Design and Performance of the ICON EUV Spectrograph

AccessURL.Name: HTTPS from SPDF
AccessURL.Description: Access to ICON data at the Space Physics Data Facility (SPDF)

Parameter.Name: Epoch Time
Parameter.Description: Sample time, midpoint of exposure. Number of msec since Jan 1, 1970.

Parameter.Name: Activity Status of the EUV Instrument
Parameter.Description: Flag for activity status of the EUV instrument, as defined in the Ephemeris Definition Document.

Parameter.Name: Altitude of the Retrieved Quantities
Parameter.Description: Altitude corresponding to the retrieved quantities, in WGS84.

Parameter.Name: Ap Index
Parameter.Description: Value of the Ap index used in the retrieval, from GPI file.

Parameter.Name: Local Earth Radius at Retrieval
Parameter.Description: Local Earth Radius at Retrieval location, from WGS.

Parameter.Name: F10.7 Values
Parameter.Description: F10.7 values used, from GPI file, in solar flux units.

Parameter.Name: F10.7a Values
Parameter.Description: F10.7a values used, from GPI file, in solar flux units.

Parameter.Name: Retrieval Flags
Parameter.Description: Quality flag associated with the retrieval and L1 data.

Parameter.Name: Height of F2 layer from Retrieval
Parameter.Description: Height of the peak of the F2 layer from Retrieval, in WGS.

Parameter.Name: Input Altitude
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Tangent altitudes corresponding to the input data, in WGS84.

Parameter.Name: Input Covariance for 61.7 nm
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Covariance of the observed Radiance in the 61.7 nm wavelength channel.

Parameter.Name: Input Covariance for 83.4 nm
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Covariance of the observed Radiance in the 83.4 nm wavelength channel.

Parameter.Name: Input Filename
Parameter.Description: Name of the L1 file used with the input data.

Parameter.Name: Input Radiance 61.7 nm
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Observed Radiance in the 61.7 nm wavelength channel.

Parameter.Name: Input Radiance 83.4 nm
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Observed Radiance in the 83.4 nm wavelength channel.

Parameter.Name: Geodetic Latitude
Parameter.Description: Geodetic Latitude at retrieval location, referenced at 300 km altitude, in WGS.

Parameter.Name: Local Solar Time
Parameter.Description: Local solar time at Retrieval.

Parameter.Name: Geodetic Longitude
Parameter.Description: Geodetic Longitude at retrieval location, referenced at 300 km altitude in WGS.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Latitude
Parameter.Description: Quasi-Dipole Magnetic Latitude at 300 km at Retrieval location, in degrees.

Parameter.Name: Magnetic Longitude
Parameter.Description: Quasi-Dipole Magnetic Longitude at 300 km at Retrieval location, in degrees.

Parameter.Name: Model Change
Parameter.Description: '*Diagnostic* A value of 1 shows which forward model parameters are set to change during the retrieval, where the parameters are in order, Rz12 multiplier, ig12 multiplier, IRI F107 multiplier, density scalar, and the j0 multiplier'.

Parameter.Name: Model Covariance
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Covariance matrix of the model parameters from the retrieval.

Parameter.Name: Model Lower Limit
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Lower limit of the parameters used in the forward model, which are in order, Rz12 multiplier, ig12 multiplier, IRI F107 multiplier, density scalar, and the j0 multiplier.

Parameter.Name: Model Parameters
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Parameters used in the forwared model, which are in order, Rz12 multiplier, ig12 multiplier, IRI F107 multiplier, density scalar, and the j0 multiplier.

Parameter.Name: Model Parameters Initial
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Initial values of the parameters used in the forward model, which are in order, Rz12 multiplier, ig12 multiplier, IRI F107 multiplier, density scalar, and the j0 multiplier.

Parameter.Name: Model Upper Limit
Parameter.Description: *Diagnostic* Upper limit of the parameters used in the forward model, which are in order, Rz12 multiplier, ig12 multiplier, IRI F107 multiplier, density scalar, and the j0 multiplier.

Parameter.Name: O+ density at the peak of the F2 layer from Retrieval
Parameter.Description: O+ density at the peak of the F2 layer from Retrieval.

Parameter.Name: WGS84 Altitude of s/c Position (Geodetic)
Parameter.Description: Altitude of the spacecraft at the time of data collection, in WGS84.

Parameter.Name: Earth Centered Earth Fixed Spacecraft Position
Parameter.Description: Location of the spacecraft in ECEF coordinates at the time of data collection. Dimension corresponding to the X, Y, Z components of Cartesian vector.

Parameter.Name: WGS84 Latitude of Spacecraft Position (Geodetic)
Parameter.Description: Geographic latitude of the spacecraft at the time of data collection, in WGS84.

Parameter.Name: WGS84 Latitude of Spacecraft Position (Geodetic)
Parameter.Description: Geographic longitude of the spacecraft at the time of data collection, in WGS84.

Parameter.Name: Number density of O+
Parameter.Description: Number density of O+ as a function of altitude found in the retrieval.

Parameter.Name: Orbit Number
Parameter.Description: Integer orbit number of the ICON spacecraft, incremented throughout the mission.

Parameter.Name: Processing Date
Parameter.Description: Date on which this file was generated by the Science Data Center.

Parameter.Name: Radiance 61.7 nm
Parameter.Description: Radiance profile of 61.7 nm emission produced by the forward model during the retrieval.

Parameter.Name: Radiance 83.4 nm
Parameter.Description: Radiance profile of 83.4 nm emission produced by the forward model during the retrieval.

Parameter.Name: Retrieval Flags
Parameter.Description: Flag corresponding to slew of the spacecraft during the time of data collection as defined in the ephemeris definition document.

Parameter.Name: 1 sigma in Height of F2 layer from Retrieval
Parameter.Description: 1 sigma in Height of F2 layer peak from retrieval.

Parameter.Name: 1 sigma in Density of F2 layer from Retrieval
Parameter.Description: 1 sigma in O+ density at the peak of the F2 layer from retrieval.

Parameter.Name: 1 Sigma in the Number Density of O+
Parameter.Description: 1 sigma in the number density of O+ as a function of altitude found in the retrieval.

Parameter.Name: Solar Zenith Angle at Retrieval Location
Parameter.Description: Solar Zenith Angle at retrieval location.

Parameter.Name: Space Environment Region Status
Parameter.Description: Flag corresponding to space environment region as defined in the ephemeris definition document during the time of data collection.

Parameter.Name: Binary Coded Integer Describing the View Status of EUV
Parameter.Description: Flag for activity status of the spacecraft, as defined in the Ephemeris Definition Document.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Sun/Shadow Status Code
Parameter.Description: Flag for activity status of the sun on the spacecraft, as defined in the Ephemeris Definition Document. 0=Sun 1=Earth Shadow.

Parameter.Name: Date and Time in UTC format
Parameter.Description: UTC time corresponding to the retrieval.

Parameter.Name: UT Seconds
Parameter.Description: UTC time in seconds since midnight corresponding to the time of the retrieval.

Parameter.Name: Unreduced Chi^2
Parameter.Description: Unreduced Chi Squared values from the retrieval.

Parameter.Name: Integer Year DOY
Parameter.Description: Year and Day of Year corresponding to the retrieval, in the format of YYYYDOY.
